article_title: Chattanooga's Chattem Chemicals to expand, add 50 jobs in St. Elmo

article_metadata.description: In its biggest expansion since the company was spun off from Chattem Inc., nearly two decades ago, Chattem Chemicals will build a fifth building on its St. Elmo campus this summer to boost production of the active pharmaceutical ingredients it makes for both consumer and industrial markets.
